== Mannarkad-II (627616) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Mannarkad-II is a village in the [[Mannarkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 1736 hectares and harbouring 4723 households with total population of 22545 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 43 km. Male population is 11053 and female population is 11492. Scheduled Caste Population is 1952 and Scheduled Tribes population is 77. Census Location Code of the village is 627616<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 17949 (79.61%)
* Literate male population: 9036 (81.75%)
* Literate female population: 8913 (77.56%)
